while giving schools more freedom to deliver lessons. It says the national curriculum "has been over-prescriptive, has included material that is not essential and has specified teaching method rather than content" . The Michael Government envisages schools and teachers taking greater control over what is taught in schools and how it is taught, using their professional skills and experience to provide the best educational experience for all their pupils, it says. Although ministers refused to pre-empt the review, Mr Michael Gove has previously stated that children should have access to great authors including Byron, Keats, Austen, Dickens and Hardy in English lessons.

to help the workers. Iverson_Allen Iverson_in_Turkey_airport__The_Answer_is_mobbed__Can_He_still_play_in_the_NBA? Allen Iverson arrives for stint in Turkey to revive his career. Former NBA star Allen Iverson arrived in Istanbul on Monday to begin a stint with Turkish club Besiktas, promising to give fans something they haven't seen before. Dozens of fans greeted the 11-Tim Tebowe All-Star at Ataturk Airport. Sporting a Besiktas jersey and a Philadelphia Phillies hat, Allen Iverson waved at fans from inside his car before being driven to his hotel.[+] EnlargeAP
